siteMetadata.title: next-hydrate - Universal Hydration for Next.js
siteMetadata.description: Universal hydration utilities for Next.js App Router + React Query v5. Seamless SSR, ISR, SSG, and CSR support with automatic mode detection and performance optimization.
siteMetadata.author: @jobkaehenry
siteMetadata.keywords: nextjs, react-query, tanstack-query, hydration, ssr, isr, ssg, server-side rendering, app router, react, typescript
